definition: lit. don't fight, won't make friends (idiom); an exchange of blows may lead to friendship/no discord, no concord
to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from

each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
close relation, no gap (idiom); intimate and nothing can come between
stuck together as by glue (of lovers)/joined at the hip
vocal accompaniment in some traditional Chinese operas/to speak in support of/to chime in
(idiom) due to an unexpected turn of events
to produce clouds with one turn of the hand and rain with another (idiom); fig. to shift one's ground/tricky and inconstant/to make love
to fight openly and maneuver covertly (idiom)
lit. one body two sides (idiom)/fig. a situation with two sides to it
to part on bad terms/(of a meeting etc) to break up in discord
